title: Fix black screen display issue

requirements.text: Diagnose and fix the black screen issue where the entire page background is black, making content invisible except for a pink heart icon at the bottom

quotes: the whole screen is black, except for a pink heart icon at the bottom of the page

acceptanceCriteria: Page background uses the intended warm sepia/ink color scheme defined in index.css
All content is visible without requiring text selection
The manga list, controls, and all UI elements are properly displayed with correct colors

requirements.text: Ensure text content is visible by default without requiring mouse drag selection to reveal it

quotes: if i click and drag the mouse over the page, i can see some text that gets highlighted

acceptanceCriteria: All text elements have proper text color that contrasts with the background
Text is readable immediately on page load without any user interaction
No text elements have transparent or matching-background colors

requirements.text: Verify the pink heart icon at the bottom is styled correctly and check if it should be visible or if it's an unintended element

quotes: except for a pink heart icon at the bottom of the page

acceptanceCriteria: Identify the source of the pink heart icon
Ensure it's either properly styled with the app theme or removed if unintended
Footer elements display with correct colors and positioning

constraints: Maintain the warm sepia/ink color palette defined in index.css
Do not modify backend/main.mo or backend logic
nonGoals: Changing the color scheme or theme
Modifying component structure beyond what's needed for the fix
